product_name: Sawyer Otter Tale Canoe Paddle - Kids' 38 in.
long_description: Lightweight, tough and just the right size for small hands, the 38 in. Sawyer Otter Tale canoe paddle gets outdoorsy kids on the water with a quality paddle. Features a lightweight, well-balanced, oval fir shaft with a fiberglass-reinforced pine blade. Back of paddle has lined columns so your kids can write down the destinations of their first canoe trips right on the paddle blade. Basic T-grip is easy for small hands to wrap around and control. Front of paddle blade features an illustration of an otter at play that kids will like. Paddle has a slightly bent 7-degree shaft. Compact size also makes this a great choice as an emergency paddle. Sawyer recommends the Sawyer Otter Tale canoe paddle for kids from 2 to 10 yrs. old.
short_description: Lightweight, tough and just the right size for small hands, the 38 in. Sawyer Otter Tale canoe paddle gets outdoorsy kids on the water with a quality paddle.
